main.name: Samantha Gadet
main.bio: Structural /mechanical engineer turned web developer, I have always loved building things, whether they are physical or not. I believe that a lot of what I have learned in my past career can translate to web development. I used to work on several scenic and artistic international projects requiring unusual creativity. Adaptability and responsiveness were essential in my position, and the atypical projects I have worked on required an openness to other disciplines and pushed me to develop my ability to learn autonomously and find solutions to problems. As I used to work with 3D modeling software with designers, I like receiving direct visual feedback of what I build, and that is the reason why I particularly enjoy front end development.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Naz must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
